Description:
In the long-awaited continuation of the adventure game " on deposit " , which received a lot of positive reviews , crazy saga to a new level . The " on deposit 2 : Bomb Adventure" is even more insane than the first part and takes the player from the first second .
Rufus could settle down and become friendly and attentive , and he would not even have occurred to cause all this chaos just for their own purposes . You would think that chaining themselves to the burning saws , training Torpedodelfinov or emptying nests platypus is totally alien to him , but ...
But it was burning Saw is the reason that again is on Goal on deposit . Quite by accident her mind is split and is now kept on three discs , each of which contains a different part of her personality . So it is the turn of Rufus , using only its own special charm , to convince three persons Goal reconnect and take a trip to Elysium . And yet he must contrive to save on deposit .
The second adventure on deposit is a separate complete story , which can go either , not even played in the first part. However, fans of the first part will open up many new heroes of the past , and finally find some answers .
